collections.name: Kiro Test Collection
collections.description: Sample test collection created via Kiro

collections.name: STR Channel Revenue API - BTW Rate Testing (Auto-Auth)
collections.description: Tests STR Channel API BTW rate changes (9% pre-2026, 21% from 2026-01-01). Requires backend running on localhost:5000. See .kiro/specs/FIN/STR Channel Revenue Calculator/POSTMAN_TESTING_GUIDE.md

collections.name: Country Report API
collections.description: Tests Country Bookings Report generation endpoint. Returns HTML file for download. Requires backend running on localhost:5000.

notes: This file stores Postman workspace, collection, and environment IDs for automated testing. Note: Collections targeting localhost must be run from Postman Desktop App (cloud runner cannot reach local servers).
